subject: Hunting and Trapping
Livestock
Automobiles
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Mark Sharer hiked a few hundred yards through forest to marshland and a pond at the southeastern edge of the Adirondacks in New York, using binoculars to scan the rim of trees for moose.
